name: CARROT (itch) (ChaseFox)
description:
****20 MINUTES COMPLETION TIME****

Point and click to interact & navigate through the hand-painted world and its story.

features
  • a handy magnifying glass
  • a handmade triple layer strawberry cake sprinkled with star-shaped jellies and spicy strawberry sauce
  • a handful of flowers
  • a handsome unicorn
  • a CARROT

https://twitter.com/chasefoxart

https://www.patreon.com/chasefoxart

Steam key included with the purchase.
